Such a useful piece in sealed! The Amazons tie each other up in a beat down, Circe here just flutters around the fringe providing prob and positioning. Great piece.

Goop
Prob and Tk for 50 pts is great. The MC is ok but with 6 range and no def you are likely going to be protecting her in the back somewhere. The 40pt one in the battleground set is better IMO.
